• Pilot Decision Framework: Highlight 12-week pilot structure
showing constrained experimentation before full commitment.
Create "Pilot Logic" visual: "Small-scale test (12 weeks, subset
of managers/employees) → Measure multiple dimensions
(engagement +4 OR productivity +3% AND managers ≥7/10
AND no red flags) → Make evidence-based decision (April
2026: scale, modify, or discontinue) → Full rollout only if
criteria met." This pilot framework demonstrates evidence-
based management—test hypotheses before scaling, establish
success criteria upfront, commit to data-driven decisions even
if results disappoint. Pilot de-risks large organizational change
by enabling course correction.
